input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Apres Pant"
Reference Product Description:
Getting the best of both worlds is what Taylor Stitch's signature Après Pant is all about. With the cozy comfort of your favorite sweats, the dashing good looks of a trusty set of chinos, and all the hard wearing functionality you’ve come to expect from our expert craftsmen, The Après Pant is built to bring you from the couch, to the trail, to that last minute lunch date all without missing a step. This dimensional Natural Sashiko iteration has been given a heavy garment wash for an ultra soft, broken-in feel right out of the box. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. Beautiful sashiko slub texture. Washed for a worn in feel. Lightly washed to bring out the amazing texture. Two front slash front pockets. Two back patch button-through pockets. Custom SF map print pocketing, made with 100% organic cotton. Elastic waistband with drawcord. Elastic cuff at hem. Dark horn buttons. Button fly. 30" inseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton/Linen Easy Pant'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Green Rectrek Pants'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Rectrek Bosc Pants'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Zephyr 29" Pant'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Pants & Jumpsuits Outdoor Voices Nimbus Sweatpants'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Zephyr Pant'
  - Name='Womens Outdoor Voices RecTrek Pants White'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Pants Outdoor Voices Cloudknit Slim Sweatpant'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Pants & Jumpsuits Outdoor Voices Cloudknit'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Jog Pant'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Men's Tapered Sweatpants'
  - Name='Rhone Spar Jogger Men's V2'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Men's Cloudknit Jogger Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Element Men's Work Out Pants'
  - Name='lululemon athletica Rhone COMMUTER JOGGERA Smarter Jogger For The WFH State Of Mind - New Men | Color: Green | Size: S'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Soft Jersey Tapered Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Heavyweight French Terry Pants'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Cloudknit Comfy Sweatpant'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Men's Cloudknit Sweatpants'
  - Name='Outdoor Voices Men's CloudKnit Joggers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Steady State Classic-Fit Cotton-Blend Fleece Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Pace Breaker Pants'
  - Name='Vuori Austin Sweatpants'
  - Name='Vuori Ponto Performance Pants'
  - Name='Vuori Men's Kore Jogger'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton/Linen Easy Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar positioning and brand, likely similar construction and hybrid comfort/fashion focus. The main difference is the cotton/linen blend versus all-cotton and possible differences in waistband/cuffs.
Likely a casual, functional pant in a similar comfort/utilitarian niche, but without further details, likely less focus on tailored details or hybrid comfort/chino function.
Comparable to previous Rectrek product: casual, active-focused; similarity in intent but indeterminate on material or silhouette specifics.
Likely a relaxed, lounge/active pant, but without clear indication of chino-like details or silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outdoor Voices Pants & Jumpsuits Outdoor Voices Nimbus Sweatpants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweatpants tend to lack the chino-inspired structure and refined tailoring of the Apres Pant, but there is some overlap in comfort/lounge use.
Similar to other Zephyr entries, likely designed for comfort and versatility; not clear if they blend casual and tailored details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Womens Outdoor Voices RecTrek Pants White
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's fit makes it less directly comparable, and 'RecTrek' implies more performance focus, though comfort intent is similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outdoor Voices Pants Outdoor Voices Cloudknit Slim Sweatpant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweatpant design is more casual and less structured, but both focus on comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outdoor Voices Pants & Jumpsuits Outdoor Voices Cloudknit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cloudknit items are generally soft and lounge-focused, like the Apres Pant, but lack the chino structure.
Likely a jogger silhouette which shares the elastic cuffs, but lacks button fly and chino-inspired tailoring.
Tapered fit gives some overlap in silhouette; sweatpants usually lack the structured elements of the Apres Pant.
Joggers are primarily athletic, with overlap in comfort, but lack the refined/prominent tailoring.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outdoor Voices Men's Cloudknit Jogger Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Jogger-style; emphasis on comfort and possibly soft, cotton-blend fabric, but likely lacks upgraded details and versatility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Element Men's Work Out Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Workout-specific, prioritizing performance fabric and fit rather than hybrid comfort and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: lululemon athletica Rhone COMMUTER JOGGERA Smarter Jogger For The WFH State Of Mind - New Men | Color: Green | Size: S
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A commuter jogger designed for both work-from-home and out-of-home flexibility, similar to Apres Pant's versatility, but materials and construction may vary.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Soft Jersey Tapered Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Soft jersey suggests comfort, tapered trousers aim for a more dressed appearance, closely matching the Apres Pant's blend of casual and tailored looks.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Heavyweight French Terry Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: French terry pants are more like upscale sweatpants, focused on comfort and less on a hybrid style/tailoring.
Primarily a sweatpant, with less emphasis on a refined silhouette or versatility.
Directly described as sweatpants, matches comfort but lacks structure and versatility.
The jogger silhouette matches some construction (elastic cuffs), but the primary focus is comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Steady State Classic-Fit Cotton-Blend Fleece Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit and cotton-blend hint at some structure, but fleece material positions this closer to sweatpants.
Pace Breaker is typically a technical, training pant meant for sport, not everyday hybrid use.
Primarily sweatpants, focused on comfort without the tailored details of the Apres Pant.
Performance pants may offer some versatility, but likely more athletic and less refined.
Jogger silhouette matches some features, emphasis is on athletic/loungewear.
